sentences.sContent: Okay he is actually a convicted forger and embezzler but does that mean his books are worthless?
sentences.sContent_eng: Okay he is actually a convicted forger and embezzler but does that mean his books are worthless?
sentences.sCn: 他是实际上一个信服的伪造者和迷惘者,但是这意味着他的书毫无价值吗？

sentences.sContent: Cobb assembles a team, including a forger, a chemist expert in anesthesiology, and Ariadne (Ellen Page), a brilliant architecture student who can design dreamscapes in which Cobb can work.
sentences.sContent_eng: Cobb assembles a team, including a forger, a chemist expert in anesthesiology, and Ariadne (Ellen Page), a brilliant architecture student who can design dreamscapes in which Cobb can work.
sentences.sCn: 科布成立了一个团队，包括一个伪造者，一名麻醉学的内行药剂师，和阿拉阿德涅（艾伦·佩奇），一个可以创造出科布工作的幻境的天才建筑学生。

remMethod.val: 来自forge(v. 伪造； 打铁)

words.tran: 伪造（forge的过去式）；锻造（金属）

trans.tranCn: 伪造者, 铁匠, 赝造者
trans.tranOther: someone who illegally copies documents, money, paintings etc and tries to make people think they are real
